text: Terestrombus is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Strombidae, the true conchs. ==Species== Species within the genus Terestrombus include: *Terestrombus afrobellatus (Abbott, 1960) *Terestrombus fragilis (Röding, 1798) *Terestrombus terebellatus (Sowerby II, 1842) ==References== Category:Strombidae
title: Terestrombus
